eecs.jago.element
Class Detonator

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--eecs.jago.element.SimElement
        |
        +--eecs.jago.element.VisibleElement
              |
              +--eecs.jago.element.SolidElement
                    |
                    +--eecs.jago.element.Detonator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, Destructible, java.lang.Runnable, Visible
public class Detonator
extends SolidElement
implements Destructible

A detonator that counts down, and explodes when the timer reaches 0:00. The detonator has a disarming button on one side that halts the countdown. Each detonator is surrounded by reflective tape; the side with the disarming button has red (eecs.jago.element.ReflectiveColors.RED) reflective tape, all other sides have black.

Since:
4.0

Constructor Detail

Detonator

public Detonator(int type)
Creates a new Detonator (35x35 pixels + 5 pixel button) facing the specified direction, one of:
  • Detonator.TOP
  • Detonator.BOTTOM
  • Detonator.LEFT
  • Detonator.RIGHT
The facing determines the location of the disarming button.

Parameters:
type - The direction of the disarming button

Detonator

public Detonator(int type,
                 int width)
Creates a new detonator with a user specified width and height (square).

Note: The default explosion is designed to work with a 35x35 detonator. Significant changes in size should be accompanied by a resized explosion.

Parameters:
type - The type of detonator
width - The width/height of the Detonator (Detonators are square)
Method Detail

setAppearance

public void setAppearance(java.lang.String filename)
Sets the appearance of the detonator to the specified image. If the Detonator has already been added to a simulation, the appearance cannot be changed, so this method must be called prior to adding the Detonator to a simulation.

Specified by:
setAppearance in interface Visible
Overrides:
setAppearance in class VisibleElement
Parameters:
filename - The file name of the image to use

addedTo

public void addedTo(SimEngine sim,
                    java.awt.geom.Point2D loc)

Overrides:
addedTo in class SimElement
Parameters:

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
Draws this Detonator. Normally draws it as a rectangle with a button, but will draw an explosion once the timer reaches 0:00.

Specified by:
draw in interface Collidable
Overrides:
draw in class VisibleElement
Parameters:
g2 - Empty

handleCollision

public void handleCollision(Collidable mover)
During a collision, checks to see if hit on the "button" side. If so, turn off the timer. Otherwise, do nothing.

Specified by:
handleCollision in interface Collidable
Overrides:
handleCollision in class SolidElement
Parameters:
mover - The Collidable object that hit this detonator.

Undocumented

Overrides:

start

public void start(int minutes,
                  int seconds)
Starts this detonator's countdown timer

Parameters:
minutes - The number of minutes in the timer
seconds - The number of seconds before this timer detonates (between 0-60).

calculateCurrentFrame

protected void calculateCurrentFrame()
Determines the current time of the detonator.
